title: Rounded Stencil Mono from File Under lecture series
content:
Typeface used by Mark El-khatib and Ray O’Meara for the posters of File Under lecture series ar the RCA.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poster-biemann1_6053.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poster-janssens_4052.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poster-poynor1_5962.jpg)

Font: 

 Everson Mono 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112749/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Weichi

comments.content: It looks like (a "stencilized") **[Everson Mono Latin 6](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112749/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Everson%20Mono%20Latin%206%20-%20Regular&fid=49faf4a37ccb885f447612005c6ee757&fsize=48&text=2.30%20PERFORMING%20ARTS%20LAB&wrap=2)** by Michael Everson [1996]
